title: Developer Lightspeed Guide
subtitle: Using the {ProductName} Developer Lightspeed to modernize your applications

abstract.para: By using Developer Lightspeed for Migration Toolkit for Applications (MTA), you can modernize applications in your organization by applying LLM-driven code changes to resolve issues found through static code analysis. You can automate code fixes, review the suggested changes, and apply all code changes at once with minimum manual effort.
